name: Metolius The Basic Pad Crashpad
description: Whether you're a bouldering newbie looking for your first pad or a seasoned veteran adding to your pad quiver, this no-frills option has the essentials to cushion falls. Four inches of foam is thick enough for most boulders, and the angled hinge design provides a safe folding point without dead space.Burly polyester body and top fabric withstands abrasion.Basic shoulder straps and waistbelt for comfortable toting over contorted ground.Single buckle closure.Two drag handles allow for easy positioning once open.
